description: How closely have you been following this week's tech news? Take the quiz and put your knowledge to the test.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, January 24, 2014
teaser: How closely have you been following this week's tech news? Take the quiz and put your knowledge to the test.
title: Great Wall of Wyoming? This week's Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Kara Swisher, formerly of All Things D, currently co-executive editor with Walt Mossberg of the new tech news and reviews website Re/Code, takes on the tech gauntlet in our weekly Silicon Tally quiz. Play along at home, below.
